SourceString:
Throw chains in target direction. Deals {AbilityDamage[Dmg1]} and pulls enemies towards you.
Enemies hit are <me_Stun>Stunned</> for <b>{dataDmg.HitStunDuration}s</>.

<b>{Radius}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius. <b>{dataDmg.AngleTotal}°</> angle.
Chains also picks up <me_DivineCore>Divine Cores</> and Gold in the area.
Throw additional chains for a <b>{AngleMod}°</> wider Angle.
Instead throw the chains with your Ranged Weapon. Damage is 120% Weapon Damage instead. 50% Weapon Range.
Chains are thrown in all directions. <b>{RadiusMod_UI}|round()%</> less radius.

Reaches Stages every <b>{dataBase.ChargeTimePerStage}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> as you <me_Channel>Channel</>.\r\nGain <b>{dataBase.WeaponDmgMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Weapon Damage per stage for <b>{dataActive.DurationTotal}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> after the <me_Channel>channeling</> ends.\r\nCharge Time scales with <b>20%</> of your Attack and Cast Speed.
While active also grants <b>+{ArmorMod_UI}|round()</> <me_Armor>Armor</> per Stage
When you reach a stage, reduce the <me_Armor>Armor</> Eruption cooldown by <b>{ArmorEruption_CDMod}s</> and Chains Cooldown by <b>{Chains_CDMod}s</>
<b>+{BuffMod_UI}%</> increased Weapon Damage per Stage\n<b>+{CostMod}</> <me_DivineCore>Divine Core</> Cost
<b>+1</> Maximum Stage.\nWhen you gain a Stage, gain <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</>.
When you release at maximum Stages, +<b>{DurationMod}s</> Duration
While active, enemies hit by Weapon Attacks have a <b>{Chance_UI}%</> chance to drop <b>{ScrapAmount}</> <me_DivineCore>Divine Cores</>

<me_Summon>Summon</> a trap with spinning blades.

On <me_Activation>Activation</> deals {dataSummonDmg.PierceDmgTotal}|floor() <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</> in a <b>{dataSummonDmg.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Automatically activates every <b>{dataActivation.ActivationIntervalTotal}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.

Maximum <me_Activation>Activations</>: <b>{dataActivation.ActivationMaxTotal}</>
Summon Limit: <b>{dataSummon.SummonLimitTotal}</>
Is destroyed when <me_Activation>Activations</> are depleted.

<me_Summon>Summon</> a turret that fires bolts at the closest enemy.

On <me_Activation>Activation</> deals <b>{dataSummonDmg.PierceDmgTotal}|floor()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>.
Automatically activates every <b>{dataActivation.ActivationIntervalTotal}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.

Maximum <me_Activation>Activations</>: <b>{dataActivation.ActivationMaxTotal}</>
Summon Limit: <b>{dataSummon.SummonLimitTotal}</>
Is destroyed when <me_Activation>Activations</> are depleted.

Your <me_Armor>Armor</> explodes dealing {AbilityDamage[Dmg1]} in a <b>{dataDmg.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
You shoot your <me_Armor>armor</> as metal shards in all directions dealing {AbilityDamage[Dmg2]} each.

Skill Damage scales with <me_Armor>Armor</>.
When you hit an enemy with another active skill, reduce Cooldown by <b>{CDRed}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>
The projectiles return to you after reaching maximum range dealing <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> Damage

Generates <b>4</> piles of <me_DivineCore>Divine Cores</> each containing <b>{Scrap}</> <me_DivineCore>Divine Cores</>. For every <me_DivineCore>Divine Core</> you collect, reduce Cooldown by <b>0.3s</>.\r\n+2s CD.

Create a force field at target location with <b>{Length}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> length.

Limit: <b>1</>

Enemies affected deal <b>{dataBase.DmgDebuff_UI}|round()%</> less Damage and have <b>{dataBase.Slow_UI}|round()%</> less Movement Speed.
Enemies deal an additional <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less Damage and have an additional <b>{SlowMod_UI}|round()%</> less Movement Speed
Grants you and your allies in the area <b>+{Armor}|round()</> <me_Armor>Armor</> and <b>+{ArmorExtra}|round()</> <me_Armor>Armor</> per enemy in the area
Control effects applied to enemies in the area have <b>{DurationMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Duration
<me_Device>Device</> <me_Summon>Summons</> inside the area deal <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Damage
Enemies inside the area take <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Damage
Grants you and allies inside the area <b>+{Glancing_UI}|round()%</> <me_Glancing>Glancing</> Chance against Projectiles
Reactivate once during Cooldown to deal <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in the Force Field and <me_Stun>Stun</> enemies for <b>1s</>.

Create <b>{dataBase.ProjectileAmount}</> metal orbs orbiting you.
Each Orb deals {AbilityDamage[Dmg1]} on contact.
<b>{dataBase.PenetrationAmount}</> <me_Penetration>Projectile Penetration</>.
<b>{dataBase.OrbitDistance_UI}m</> orbit range.
Grants you <b>{DmgMod_UI}%</> increased Total Damage per remaining Orb
When Forge Call hits an enemy, its cooldown is reduced by <b>{CDMod}s</>\n<b>+{ScrapCostMod}</> <me_DivineCore>Divine Core</> Cost
On use and every <b>{Delay}</> seconds afterwards, your next <me_LightningDam>Lightning</> Skill deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}%</> more Damage per active Orb
When you use a Projectile Skill consume an Orb for <b>{DmgMod_UI}%</> increased Total Damage
Grants you <b>{GlanceChanceMod_UI}%</> <me_Glancing>Glancing</> Hits Chance per remaining Orb
The bonus <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> from Heat Up is dealt in a <b>{Radius_UI}m</> radius instead
While orbiting your orbs deal up to <b>+{DmgMod_UI}|floor()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> after <b>{Duration}s</>
<b>{ProjSpeedMod_UI}|round()%</> more Projectile Speed\nEnemies are <me_Stun>Stunned</> for <b>{StunDuration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> after <b>{HitAmount}</> hits
Orbs deal <b>{WeaponDmgScaleMod_UI}%</> of your Weapon Damage as additional damage

Toggle to activate.

Costs <b>{dataBase.BaseRecurringScrapCost}</> <me_DivineCore>Divine Cores</> per second
Grants <b>+{dataBase.ArmorFlat}</> <me_Armor>Armor</>
Grants <b>{dataBase.ArmorTotal_UI}|round()%</> increased Total <me_Armor>Armor</>
Grants <b>+{dataBase.StunDisruptRes_UI}%</> <me_Disruption>Disruption</> and <me_Stun>Stun</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</>
Grants <b>{dataBase.MovementSpeed_UI}|round()%</> less Movement Speed

Using a Movement Skill cancels Ironclad.
Cooldown starts after deactivation.

While active, when you get hit, lose <b>{ScrapCost}</> <me_DivineCore>Divine Cores</> and shoot a metal shard towards the attacker dealing <b>{Damage}|floor()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</> (Scales with <me_Armor>Armor</>)

While active, for every <me_DivineCore>Divine Core</> gained, grants you <b>+{ArmorMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=0)</> <me_Armor>Armor</> up to <b>{ArmorMax}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=0)</> <me_Armor>Armor</>\nThis resets on deactivation
Grants you <me_Unstoppable>Unstoppable</> while active\n<b>+{InitialCostMod}</> Initial <me_DivineCore>Divine Core</> Cost
While active grants you <b>+{PierceRetaliation}|round()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce</> <me_Retaliate>Retaliation</>\n<b>+{ScrapCostMod}</> <me_DivineCore>Divine Core</> Cost per second
<me_Armor>Armor</> Shards deals <b>{DmgRatio_UI}%</> of your <me_Retaliate>Retaliation</> Damage as added <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>

Throw <b>{dataBase.MineAmount}</> mines to target location.
They activate after <b>{dataBase.ActivationDelay}s</>.
Last for <b>{dataBase.MineDuration}s</>.
Explodes on contact dealing {AbilityDamage[Dmg1]} in a <b>{Radius}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Consecutive explosions on the same target deal <b>{dataBase.RepeatDmgMultiplier_UI}|round()%</> less damage.
<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage\nThe mines don\'t detonate automatically when near enemies\nWhen you use an <me_Exhaust>Exhaust</> Skill the mines detonate

Emit an <me_Aura>Aura</> with a <b>{dataSus.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\r\nAura grants you and allies <b>+{dataBase.ArmorFlat}|round()</> <me_Armor>Armor</>.\r\nAura grants you and allies <b>{dataBase.WeaponDmgIncrease_UI}|round()%</> increased Weapon Damage.
